entry.title: Hello There!
entry.summary: Welcome to the placeholder for my portfolio and blog focused on learning and development, e-learning, and learning technology! Here, I'll share my experiments and thoughts on improving learning effectiveness for adults and how to apply technology to training materials. I'm working on articles about using generative AI tools, accessibility for neurodivergent audiences, using animation in e-learning, and much more. Stay tuned for updates and content coming soon!
entry.content:
Welcome to the placeholder for my portfolio and blog focused on learning and development, e-learning, and learning technology! Here, I'll share my experiments and thoughts on improving learning effectiveness for adults and how to apply technology to training materials.

I'm working on articles about using generative AI tools, accessibility for neurodivergent audiences, using animation in e-learning, and much more.

Stay tuned for updates and content coming soon!
